body.name: Mini Projector, CLOKOWE 2024 Upgraded Portable Projector with 9000 Lux and Full HD 1080P, Movie Projector Compatible with iOS/Android Phone/Tablet/Laptop/PC/TV Stick/Box/USB Drive/DVD/Game Console
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 23 mins
features: 【2024 Upgrade Mini Projector】 Mini projector has 9000 Lux brightness and supports 1080P Full HD 30-180(Recommended for 60 -100 inches) inch display, adopting advanced LED technology and uniform illumination method, which make the edges of the projection brighter and clearer. These ensure the projection image quality presents a real, dynamic, and color-vibrant effect. The mini projector also applied diffuse reflection technology, protect your eyes away from tiredness.

【Mini & Portable Projector】 This mini projector has a unique and elegant design with a size of 6.74x5.28x2.96 inches and a weight of 0.72 kg. It is small enough to fit in your bag. Moreover, there is a handle on the product box for carrying. Therefore, it is rather light and handy to carry when you go out.

【Multiple Devices Connection & Wide Application】 Equipped with HDMI, USB, and AV interfaces, the movie projector works perfectly with iPhone/Android Phone, Tablet/iPad, Laptop, Macbook, Blu-ray Player, TV boxes, DVD players, PS4, USB flash disks, etc. It can be applied to home theaters, video games, parties, and outdoor activities. ☛( Note: Due to HDCP copyright, this projector doesn't support Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu, but you could use Amazon Fire Stick or Roku Stick.)

【Immersive Home Theater】 Built-in Hi-Fi stereo speakers provide original audio fidelity. Also featured with audio output port to connect headphones or external speakers. Using the latest temperature control technology, the fan noise is reduced by 80%, and the heat dissipation is more effective. These bring you an immersive sound experience.

【Three-Year Warranty & High-quality Service】ClokoWe always adheres to the customer-first service philosophy. If you have any questions or problems when using our products, please feel free to contact us directly on Amazon. We offer a quick reply within 24 hours, a three-year product replacement warranty, and a lifetime after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm Tips： 1. Solution to blurry image A. Keep the projector horizontal and make its front end parallel to the wall/screen. B. Rotate the focusing ring to focus the image. C. Keep the projector at a proper distance from the wall/screen. (Effective distance: 3.5-13ft) 2. How to use a USB flash drive/hard drive After the projector recognizes the USB flash drive/hard drive, the USB icon on the homepage will turn blue. Then select one of the 4 file options (Movie, Music, Photo, or Text) to enter the corresponding file folder page. 3. Wired connection to phone/tablet It will fail if only a common USB charging cable is used to connect the projector and phone/tablet. It is necessary to use a Micro USB/Type-C/Lightning to HDMI adapter.(Note: the adapter not included ) Connect the adapter to the micro USB/Type-C/Lightning port of the phone/tablet, the HDMI port of the projector, and the USB port of the projector/power adapter.

Product Parameters Projector Model ClokoWe M8 Batteries Included No Hardware Interface HDMI, USB, AV, Audio Control Method Remote, Button Projection Mode Front / Rear / Ceiling Mounting Type Table / Tripod / Ceiling Aspect Ratio 16:9 / 4:3 Zoom Function 25%-100% Visible Screen Size 30-120 inch Supported Resolution 1920 x 1080P Projector Dimension 0.72 kg; 6.74 x 5.28 x 2.96 inch Package Dimension 1.03 kg; 8.86 x 4.73 x 7.88 inch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little but powerful
reviews.reviewText: This projector works great! I bought it for a church presentation. It is smaller than I expected so when it came I wasn’t sure it would be powerful enough to project a big enough and clear image that everyone in the gym could see. But, IT DID!!! The clarity is great. I love how easy it is to hook up and get started. Plug it in, and you’re ready. It’s quiet. The box it comes in is a good sturdy box with a handle so transporting it to everyplace I’m going to use it will be easy and I won’t worry about damaging it. I’m very happy with this projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Portable
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely thrilled with this projector purchase! The affordability is unmatched, and its performance is outstanding. Setting it up was a breeze, and the value you get for its price is truly surprising. A must-have recommendation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price
reviews.reviewText: For 50 bucks this is great! The pros- display is very clear and good resolution even at a large size- inputs and menu systems all straightforward- compact size and even options to flip screen orientation. The cons- somewhat dim at larger sizes( you’ll want the lights turned down), internal speaker is handy but pretty quiet (you’ll want to hook up to another speaker unless you are right next to it. ) Lacks keystone correction. But for the price? Fun way to watch a movie from roku or a laptop - would be great for kids you want to project on their wall, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cinematic Must Have: 5 Stars for the Mini Projector, CLOKOWE 2023 Upgraded Portable Projector
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Mini Projector, CLOKOWE 2023 Upgraded Portable Projector , and I must say it has exceeded my expectations on every front. This mini projector is a game-changer for anyone who loves entertainment on the go.Design and Portability (5/5):It's incredibly lightweight, making it easy to carry in my backpack wherever I go. Setting it up is a breeze, and the adjustable focus knob ensures a crisp and clear image every time.Brightness and Connectivity (5/5):Despite its small size, the brightness of this mini projector is remarkable. It's more than sufficient for indoor use. The variety of connectivity options, including HDMI and USB, make it compatible with a range of devices, from laptops to streaming devices and gaming consoles. The built-in speaker is surprisingly decent, but for a more immersive experience, I recommend using external speakers.Battery Life (5/5):One of the standout features is the impressive battery life. I was able to enjoy a full-length movie without worrying about the battery running out.Versatility (5/5):The adjustable projection size allows for a customizable viewing experience, whether you're in a small room or a larger space. The keystone correction feature ensures a perfectly aligned image, even when the projector is at an angle.In conclusion, the Mini Projector is a stellar performer that combines portability with top-notch image quality. Whether you're a movie enthusiast, a business professional, or someone who loves sharing content with friends and family, this mini projector is a must-have. It's a compact wonder that truly delivers a big-screen experience. I wholeheartedly give it 5 stars and highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a mini projector!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, quiet, and Portable!
reviews.reviewText: We use this for school time and for special dinner movies. The image is very high quality - we've used it mostly at a distance of 6-12 ft, and the image was great. The brightness is good for the size and sound (it's not a loud fan), but you may struggle to see the projection unless you're in a very dim or dark room. Our main school room is a little bright, so the projection wasn't the best, but it was usable. When we use it in darker rooms with less direct sunlight, it performs much better. But based on the price and the quieter fan (which we really appreciate), I felt like we were absolutely getting what we paid for. It's very portable, we plug in a roku stick and we're good to stream whatever we need/want. We love the built in speakers (though not great for movies, we use a speaker set for that, for a higher quality sound - which are easy to plug in and use - it takes me 1 minute to grab them and set it up); the built-in speakers work really well for school or if we're using the projector in a smaller room or space.All in all, this product performs really well for the price and size.A few cons: The projector can't angle the image to square the output when the projector is at a tilt. The speakers get tinny and weak especially in a bigger space. Hard to use in a medium level of light or brighter as the image is hard to see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but Mighty
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So I actually waited a while to see how the projector held up before doing a review. Let me just say that it far exceeded my expectations. The first picture was when I opened and turned it on for the first time right out of the box. I wanted to see how it worked and whether it was even going to be worth keeping. Like i mentioned before it exceeded my expectations Don't get me wrong the interface is extremely simple. it has one main screen that gives you connection options. You just have to plug in an HD cable which comes in the box and connect it to your computer or tablet and it projects to a screen or wall. It's bright and very clear to see. I purchased a movie screen from another seller which was bigger than I expected but with small adjustments, you can move the projector back to cover the whole thing. This was our first time using it and we still hadn't gotten the hang of it just yet. The projector is compact enough that you can take it with you traveling and set it up anywhere you like. The only con is that there is no speaker or if there is one its not loud enough. We had to connect a Bluetooth speaker to the tablet to hear, but its not a deal breaker.Overall great purchase and a great price for what I received. Summer nights have gotten a whole lot better
